root.name: Scooby-Doo!: Night of 100 Frights
root.description: Plot The plot in Scooby-Doo!: Night of 100 Frights features Scooby-Doo trying to find his lost friends, as the plot continues he meets various ghosts and monsters from past Scooby-Doo TV series. Monsters GhostsHere's a list of monsters and ghosts from past Scooby-Doo TV series, that appear in this game: Witch DoctorThe ScarecrowThe Creepy Heap from the DeepThe Ghost of Captain MoodyThe Tar MonsterThe GargoyleGhost of GeronimoThe GargoyleThe Funland RobotThe Space KookWitch Doctor

similar_games.game: Crash Bandicoot: The Wrath of Cortex
